events.message: I am reporting a car collision that occurred last night resulting in significant damage to my vehicle. I need to start the claim process immediately.
The claim has been successfully categorized under Auto Accident following the report of the vehicle collision on the specified date.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to your case to assist you through the process and guide you on next steps.
Your claim regarding the car accident has been acknowledged by our insurance team, and we are now preparing to process the necessary evaluations.
Please submit the police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and your insurance policy documents to proceed with your auto accident claim.
All requested documents including police report and vehicle photos have been submitted successfully for the evaluation of your claim.
The investigation has commenced to assess the damage to your car and to verify the details surrounding the vehicle accident.
We have completed the investigation into your car accident claim and gathered all necessary information to move forward with settlement.
A settlement proposal has been prepared reflecting the assessed damage repair costs and will be sent to you shortly for review and approval.
We have received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement offer, and we are reviewing your concerns carefully before finalizing.
Your auto accident claim has been approved based on the investigation findings and accepted settlement terms.
The payment for your approved claim amount has been processed and should be reflected in your account within 3 business days.
The claim related to your vehicle accident has been officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout this process.
